title: Day 1153
content:
# Day 1153

I want to make a simple children's coloring book focused on Bitcoin. Today's Medium will be about me creating this. It will, of course, have 21 images. Here they are:

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*EMVR2vV5Mw0BgbeVYvUBYw.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*Ul347tGKYLFYFIxBmw81MA.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*1lXvU3FyMCgSzq8jOjuy9g.png)

Good start so far. Here is what I have for a first draft of the front and back cover.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*Jg7OCS6bVBp3ZsuVDdQrPw.png)

A great start!

5/18/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
